## Winning Projects
[![Embedded YouTube video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/kzdXmUTYq1A/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzdXmUTYq1A)
### VoiceGraph-Honey Paptan
VoiceGraph: Speak your automation, watch it execute. Built with Cerebras (Llama 4) for lightning-fast inference, Groq Whisper for voice input, and Docker MCP Gateway orchestrating secure containerized tools. Features visual debugging with AI error analysis, voice/text editing, and background scheduling.
üèÜBest Use of Cerebras[GitHub RepositoryView Code](https://github.com/HoneyPaptan/voicegraph)
[![Embedded YouTube video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/OwQi4XXJnPI/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwQi4XXJnPI)
### Sure AI-Adithya Vardhan Reddy

Title: SAS announces winners of 2024 SAS Hackathon
Author: Cary, NC (Nov 20, 2024)
Published Date: 2024-11-20T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://www.sas.com/en_us/news/press-releases/2024/november/2024-hackathon-winners.html
Text: 1. [Home](https://www.sas.com/en_us.html)
2. [SAS Newsroom](https://www.sas.com/en_us/news.html)
3. [Press Releases](https://www.sas.com/en_us/news/press-releases.html)
4. SAS announces winners of 2024 SAS Hackathon

# SAS announces winners of 2024 SAS Hackathon

## Innovative solutions to business and social challenges driven by access to SAS Viya and its new AI tools

_Cary, NC_
_(Nov 20, 2024)_

SAS, a leader in data and AI, has announced the winners of the 2024 [**SAS Hackathon**](https://www.sas.com/sas/events/hackathon.html) across 25 regional, industry, technology, specialty and student categories. These winning teams represent businesses, government agencies, nonprofits, universities and SAS Partners.

This year‚Äôs SAS Hackathon boasted 1,731 registrants from more than 70 countries. This led to an all-time high of 145 approved teams that participated in the month-long hack, supported by 110 SAS mentors. SAS produces the annual SAS Hackathon, which was sponsored this year by long-time SAS Partners Micros
